Commercial Project Portfolio

See how we've secured hotels, colleges, and commercial buildings throughout Central California

Proven Results for Complex Projects

From 120-room hotels requiring sophisticated master key systems to college campuses managing thousands of student credentials, we've handled the access control challenges that matter to Central California businesses. Every project showcases our commitment to reliable systems, professional installation, and ongoing support.

Request Project Quote Contact Us

Project Showcase

Hotel Project - Complete Access Control System

Challenge:

Complete access control system for luxury hotel with multiple building types

Solution:

Integrated card reader system with mobile credentials for staff and traditional key cards for guests

Results:

Seamless guest experience with enhanced security and operational efficiency

Project Details:

  • 120+ guest rooms with keycard access
  • Staff zones with time-based restrictions
  • Master key coordination for housekeeping
  • Integration with property management system
  • Emergency override capabilities

College Project - Student Housing Access Control

Challenge:

Student housing access control with mobile credentials and facility management

Solution:

Smartphone-based access system with visitor management and emergency features

Results:

Modern access solution that students love with administrative control for campus security

Project Details:

  • 500+ student credentials on mobile devices
  • Visitor registration and temporary access
  • Integration with campus security systems
  • Remote management and audit capabilities
  • Future expansion planning for additional buildings

Commercial Building - Multi-Tenant Office Access

Challenge:

Multi-tenant office building with complex access requirements

Solution:

Scalable access control with tenant management and visitor tracking

Results:

Professional building security that attracts quality tenants and simplifies management

Project Details:

  • 50+ office suites with individual tenant control
  • Visitor management with temporary credentials
  • After-hours access with time restrictions
  • Central management dashboard for property managers
  • Integration with building automation systems

  • Staff area security
